process_overview.description: Comprehensive workflow for creating high-quality reviews efficiently
core_principles: Planning should include both content and personality elements from the beginning
Drafting should integrate information and personality simultaneously
ALL quality checks must be completed internally before presenting any draft
Revisions should be strategic and consolidated

critical_workflow.description: Mandatory sequential steps that MUST be followed in exact order
critical_workflow.implementation_warning: Failure to follow this sequence will result in lower quality reviews and wasted effort

phases.name: Information Gathering
phases.dependency_warning: NEVER begin drafting before information gathering is complete
phases.validation: All critical information must be gathered before proceeding
implementation: Ask strategic questions to fill information gaps
Review and analyze all provided product images
Organize raw insights into usable categories

phases.name: Pre-Writing Planning
phases.dependency_warning: Information Gathering phase MUST be completed before planning
phases.validation: All pre-planning checkboxes must be marked complete

phases.name: Internal Draft Creation and Quality Checks
phases.action: Create draft and complete ALL internal checks before presenting
phases.dependency_warning: Do NOT present draft until ALL internal checks are complete
phases.validation: Draft should implement all planning decisions and pass all quality checks
implementation: Write complete draft with integrated personality
• Authenticity verification to ensure genuine voice
Make all necessary adjustments before presenting draft
Present only fully refined draft to human
phases.reference: first_draft_success_framework section below and quality-assessment.json > quality_assessment_framework

phases.name: Collaborative Refinement
phases.action: Implement human feedback with targeted revisions
phases.dependency_warning: Only begin after presenting fully-polished initial draft
phases.validation: Use a single update or rewrite command rather than multiple changes
implementation: Apply targeted revisions using a single update command
Confirm human approval of refined version

phases.name: Final Verification
phases.action: Verify the final approved review meets all quality standards
phases.dependency_warning: Only proceed after human has approved the final draft
phases.validation: Complete only after human approves final version
implementation: Confirm all required elements are present and properly formatted

product_adaptation_process.description: Process for adapting the review writing workflow to specific product categories
guiding_principles: Product categories should inspire rather than restrict your approach
Create custom section types based on your unique product testing experience
Focus areas should be tailored to what makes each specific product unique
Develop original section names that reflect both product category and your review style
Consider what information would be most valuable to potential buyers of this specific product

actions: Identify product category and specific attributes
Determine unique aspects requiring special attention
Plan any specialized sections or approaches
outputs: Specialized question list for this product type

actions: Adjust personality balance based on product type
outputs: Balanced review with appropriate personality level

actions: Ensure specialized terminology is used appropriately
Check that unique product attributes are highlighted
Confirm appropriate balance for product category
outputs: Refined review with optimal category-specific content

unique_content_identification.description: Process for identifying what information is most valuable for specific product types
steps: Consider the primary purchasing concerns for this product category
Identify what information is difficult to find in product descriptions
Determine what aspects require real-world testing to evaluate
Consider what surprised you during product testing
Identify what information would help buyers make better decisions

critical_pre_planning.title: ⚠️ REQUIRED PRE-WRITING CHECKLIST ⚠️
critical_pre_planning.description: Essential preparation steps that must be completed before drafting begins

mandatory_steps.action: Select appropriate personality/humor techniques for this review
guidance: Choose techniques that naturally fit the product and context
Consider the product category and appropriate personality level
Select techniques that highlight the product's most distinctive features

mandatory_steps.action: Determine personality adjustments for each content section
guidance: Assign specific ratio targets to each planned section
Adjust based on content purpose and product category

mandatory_steps.action: Pre-select list items for personality enhancement
guidance: Identify which 30-40% of list items will receive enhancement
Focus on the most distinctive or important features
Plan enhancement style that complements each feature

checklist: Primary category keywords identified and validated
Feature-specific keywords mapped to planned sections
Long-tail variations documented for natural inclusion
mandatory_steps.validation: All keyword strategy items must be checked before proceeding

mandatory_steps.action: Plan thematic elements if using a thematic approach
guidance: Identify theme that naturally connects to product function or form
Plan themed section headers if using consistent theme
Map thematic intensity across different sections

checkboxes: I have selected appropriate personality techniques for this specific product
I have assigned personality ratios to each section
I have pre-selected list items for enhancement
I have confirmed keyword strategy implementation
I have planned thematic elements if using a thematic approach

initial_capture.description: Raw thought collection process before structured drafting
guidelines: Capture all immediate reactions and experiences
Include specific details even if unorganized
Note any memorable incidents or discoveries

content_analysis.description: Organizing raw content into useful categories
elements_to_extract: Unique use cases for experiential sections
organization_process: Group related observations by potential review section
Identify content with high keyword potential
Flag unique insights for feature highlighting
Note unexpected discoveries for potential thematic elements
Identify patterns that could guide review structure

first_draft_success_framework.description: Approach for creating high-quality first drafts that require minimal revision

integrated_writing_process.principle: Write with simultaneous attention to information and personality
techniques: Draft each section with its pre-determined balance level in mind
Place creative elements at pre-planned strategic points
Follow complex sentences with simpler ones for rhythm
Monitor sentence variety during initial drafting rather than revision
Front-load factual information before adding personality elements

section_transitions.principle: Plan transitions between sections to maintain flow while changing complexity
techniques: End higher-complexity sections with a simpler transitional sentence
Begin lower-complexity sections with personality before technical details
Use thematic elements selectively to bridge different complexity levels
Connect sections with logical progression of ideas
Reference preceding sections when building on previously established concepts

implementation_guidance: Write complete sections rather than fragmented parts
Balance information and personality from the beginning rather than adding personality later
Ensure factual accuracy before adding creative elements
Monitor overall flow and readability throughout the drafting process
Check each section against its intended purpose and balance target

length_optimization_strategy.description: Guidelines for optimizing review length for maximum impact and quality

target_ranges.examples: Single-purpose items, basic accessories, simple tools
target_ranges.implementation: Focus on user experience and practical application

target_ranges.examples: Multi-function devices, mid-tier electronics, specialized equipment
target_ranges.implementation: Balance technical details with experiential content

target_ranges.examples: Advanced electronics, professional tools, systems with multiple components
target_ranges.implementation: Include comprehensive technical assessment alongside experience

core_principles.description: Value-dense content is more important than hitting exact word targets
core_principles.implementation: Remove redundant content even if it reduces total length

core_principles.description: Most critical insights should appear in first half of review
core_principles.implementation: Ensure opening sections contain highest-value information

core_principles.description: Allocate word count to sections based on information value

implementation_guidance: Focus on delivering maximum value within the target range
Use product complexity as primary length determinant
Cut redundant content rather than adding filler to reach targets
Adjust section proportions based on product-specific information needs
Verify final word count falls within appropriate range for product complexity

redundancy_check.description: Reference to the comprehensive redundancy review framework
implementation_guidance: Refer to redundancy-verification.json for the complete redundancy checking framework
Use the checkpoints, resolution strategies, and implementation process defined there
This centralized approach ensures consistency across the framework

creative_technique_application.description: Workflow for incorporating creative elements throughout the review process
planning_phase: Select theme if using thematic approach (see thematic-frameworks.json)
Identify opportunities for figurative language in key sections
Plan sensory element distribution across product description
Determine appropriate section names based on theme (if applicable)
implementation_phase: Incorporate thematic elements at strategic anchor points
Apply figurative language techniques after establishing core information
Include sensory details in experiential sections
Use micro-narratives for specific usage scenarios
review_phase: Verify creative elements enhance rather than obscure information
Check thematic consistency across sections (if using theme)
Ensure creative techniques are appropriate for product category
Confirm sensory elements accurately reflect product experience

single_version_per_response.definition: Each response must contain a maximum of one artifact version update
single_version_per_response.rationale: Multiple updates in a single response create confusion and unnecessarily increase chat length
implementation: Collect all feedback points before making any changes
Use a single "update" command for minor changes or "rewrite" for major revisions
Bundle all requested modifications into this single operation
If changes are substantial, default to "rewrite" rather than multiple "update" commands

validation.check: Confirm each response contains no more than one artifact command

best_practices: Use "update" for targeted changes to specific sections
Use "rewrite" for substantial revisions affecting multiple sections
Limit "update" to 4 times per message maximum to reduce conversation length
When using "update", provide both old_str and new_str with precise matching
Prefer making changes to the minimal set of chunks necessary

scenarios.condition: Changes affect 30% or more of content
Changes are isolated to specific sentences

scenarios.action: Use rewrite instead of multiple updates

techniques: Always favor a single rewrite over multiple updates when changes are extensive
Keep old_str selections as small as possible while maintaining uniqueness
Batch related changes together when possible
Consider conversation length impact when choosing between update and rewrite

final_polish_process.description: Steps for finalizing review before submission

polish_steps.description: Ensure proper section headers, paragraph structure, and visual elements
Check for marketing-style language and convert to authentic experience
Ensure strategic keywords are naturally integrated
Ensure content flows naturally and is easily scannable
techniques: Read review aloud to catch awkward phrasing
Check for smooth transitions between sections

checkpoints.name: Keyword Implementation Verification
requirements: Feature keywords aligned with specific capabilities
Problem-solution terms incorporated in usage sections
Comparison keywords placed in appropriate context
checkpoints.validation: Each section must pass keyword verification before continuing

checkpoints.name: Section Balance Verification
requirements: Personality elements enhance rather than obscure information
Section connects logically to adjacent content
checkpoints.validation: Each section must pass balance verification before continuing

checklist: All required sections are present and properly formatted
Information/personality balance meets targets for each section
Redundancy has been eliminated or transformed into value-added repetition
Creative elements enhance rather than obscure information
Specific details (measurements, prices, model numbers) are accurate
